title: XPRIZE
content: Bringing about radical breakthroughs for the benefit of humanity.

title: PROPUBLICA
content: Supporting the creation of independent media stories with a “moral force.”

title: Los Angeles Social Venture Partners
content: Amplifying impact through building social capital, investing in collaboration, and increasing funder engagement.

title: Tierra del Sol
content: Empowering adults with developmental disabilities through workforce development; Providing opportunities for paid employment or professional volunteerism placement.

title: KIVA
content: Connecting people through lending; leveraging the internet and a network of microfinance institutions to alleviate poverty around the world.

title: CICLAVIA
content: Catalyzing vibrant public spaces, active transportation and good health through car-free street events in Los Angeles.

title: AltaSea
content: Bridging gaps in STEM education to grow the Blue Tech economy and investing in sustainable aquaculture.

title: Caltech Resnick Institute
content: Fostering transformative advances in energy science and technology. We kick-started the graduate fellowship program by delivering critically needed seed funding to support their cutting-edge, interdisciplinary research, and spurred further innovation by supporting their western regional clean-tech business plan competition.

title: Heal the Bay
content: Employing science, hands-on education, advocacy to improve the quality of life and the health of beaches, ocean, and inland waterways.

title: T.R.U.S.T. South LA
content: Working to create affordable homes for local families, with a plan to make better use of the 3000 acres of underutilized land in South LA.

title: Sierra Club
content: Leading conversations on climate disruption and the future of energy; Launching coalitions for energy justice to push Los Angeles towards a clean energy economy.

title: GDIGM
content: Providing mentorship and educational pathways for girls across Los Angeles to achieve greater gender equity in media.

title: Opportunity Fund
content: Establishing financial and referral networks for minority, immigrant, and women entrepreneurs and small business owners.

title: 826LA
content: Supporting students ages 6 to 18 with their creative and expository writing skills; empowering teachers; and providing tutoring, workshops, and more.

title: Library Foundation of Los Angeles
content: Providing in-person assistance, study materials and access to services and resources for citizenship and naturalization through the New Americans Initiative.

title: Surf Bus Foundation
content: Providing access for inner-city youth to engage in ocean sports and develop lifelong relationships with the sea.

title: Stockton Economic Empowerment Demonstration
content: Via Economic Security Project, piloting a basic income program to ensure opportunity and economic security.
